# Problem 1
## part 0 - setup
call the library **moderndive** and **tidyverse** and install the dataset *early_january_weather*
```{r message = FALSE}
library(moderndive)
library(tidyverse)
data("early_january_weather")
problem1_df = early_january_weather
```

## part 1 - description of the dataset (partial code and dataset description)
```{r}
variable_name = c(names(problem1_df))
mean_temp = mean(pull(problem1_df, temp))
start_day = with(problem1_df, min(day))
end_day = with(problem1_df, max(day))
```
The installed dataset contains variables *`r variable_name`*; it 
contains *`r nrow(problem1_df)`* rows and *`r ncol(problem1_df)`* columns. The
mean temperature is *`r round(mean_temp, digits = 2)`*. 
**Additonal information**: The data is collected in the year *`r unique(pull(problem1_df, year))`* in *`r unique(pull(problem1_df, origin))`* from
day *`r start_day`* to *`r end_day`*.
